Posts.Content: hi gillian, how lovely to be going to florida, i do hope u have a great time. i too am interested in the sunbathing debate. my impression was to avoid the sun at all costs but that is so difficult. the sun shine and out to play we want to go. i shall be following your thread with curiosity and hopefully we shall have a conclusion. good luck x x
Posts.Title: sunbathing

Posts.Content: hi katie, just read ur thread and found it very helpful, thank u. i started my chemo on the 27th jan so interested in ur progress.hope u dont mind :-) take care and good luck x x
